tool_description: get the weather for the city.
name: OpenweatherApp
title: OpenweatherApp

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://openweatherapp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openweatherapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://openweatherapp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openweatherapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
